title: Strengthening App Development Practice Competencies: International Competency Development Simulations for Multicultural Adaptation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with colleagues from three or more cultural backgrounds in VR simulation environments to complete work tasks.
Learners recognize intercultural communication barriers and apply context-appropriate communication strategies at least 80% of the time.
Learners meet 70% or more of the multicultural team project rubric criteria (cultural sensitivity, collaboration efficiency, problem-solving).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
